title: Champagne Jeangout
description: Experience the warm hospitality of Champagne Jeangout in Rilly-la-Montagne near Reims. Surrounded by beautiful vineyards, it is the perfect place to learn more about champagne production.
extended: Discover our biodynamic Champagne house in Rilly-la-Montagne
extended-description: Experience the warm hospitality of Champagne Jeangout in Rilly-la-Montagne near Reims. Surrounded by beautiful vineyards, it is the perfect place to learn more about champagne production.

title: Champagne Xavier Loriot
description: Exploring the beautiful vineyards by e-bike and enjoying a picnic sounds like a fantastic idea!

title: Champagne Guy Charbaut
description: Champagne house Guy Charbaut in Mareuil-sur-Ay warmly invites you to discover their 19th-century wine cellars and taste their exquisite cuvées, crafted with utmost care and expertise.
